Initializer# init(bounds:interactionModes:selection:scope:content:)

MapKitSwiftUIiOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+Mac CatalystvisionOS

```
@MainActor @preconcurrency
init<SelectedValue, C>(
    bounds: MapCameraBounds? = nil,
    interactionModes: MapInteractionModes = .all,
    selection: Binding<SelectedValue?>,
    scope: Namespace.ID? = nil,
    @MapContentBuilder content: () -> C
) where Content == MapSelectableContentView<SelectedValue, C>, SelectedValue : MapSelectable, C : MapContent
```

Available when `Content` conforms to `View`.
